name: transfer_tokens
body: let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . from_token_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . to_token_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_program = ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () ;

fields.name: from_token_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , constraint = from_token_account . owner == authority . key () , constraint = from_token_account . mint == to_token_account . mint)]
